name: USCConnect
body:
### About The USC Connect App.
This mobile app allows users to easily search [USC Connect's database](http://www.sc.edu/uscconnect/), save personal notes, and has quick access to the online GLD application.

### How To Install The App
To install the app, [click here ](https://github.com/SCCapstone/USCConnect/blob/master/USCConnect.apk?raw=true)
to download the Android installation package. 

### App Video Demonstration
Watch this video for a quick walk through of the app.
